description:
Unsettled by something he heard on the ghost ship, Kid asks his father an unimaginable question. Dr. Stein has his own questions regarding Medusa’s qualifications as a nurse.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feroce scontro sulla nave fantasma. L`inferno nella mia testa?
Fierce Battle Aboard the Ghost Ship!: The Hell Inside My Head?
Gekitou! Yuureisen: Boku no Atama no Naka no Jigoku?
À l`attaque ! Vaisseau fantôme. L`enfer dans ma tête ?
激闘! 幽霊船 ~ボクの頭の中の地獄?~
